hero.description: QonnectOne is a revolutionary technological solution that supports companies and supervised institutions in key operational and regulatory areas. Additionally, it ensures regulatory compliance, provides instant payment processing, and supports systematic revenue growth through process automation.
hero.unlock: Unlock business potential and earn more

footer.description: Comprehensive solutions for payment integration for companies and supervised financial institutions. Security, innovation and regulatory compliance.

q1.question: 1. Why Qonnect?
q1.answer: Because the offer is tailored to the specific requirements of your company. Our developers can quickly adapt parts of the application to your industry and individual requirements.

q2.question: 2. Why use an external partner instead of your own system?
q2.answer: Developing a dedicated IT system involves costs and risks. With us, you can do it in record time, get ahead of the competition and benefit from a well-developed system.

q3.question: 3. What is a SaaS application?
q3.answer: A SaaS (Software as a Service) application is software made available to users over the Internet on a subscription basis. It does not require installation on a computer - you use it through a browser. All data and updates are maintained in the cloud by the service provider.

caseStudies.text: Discover real stories from our clients and see how they increased efficiency and profits thanks to our platform.

card1.title: Meet the requirements of supervised institutions
card1.description: Ensure compliance with legal and regulatory requirements efficiently, without delays.

card2.title: Acquire partners and use their licenses and products
card2.description: Quickly connect with partners and leverage their licenses, APIs, and products in one ecosystem.

card3.title: All payment methods in one place
card3.description: Combine various payment methods in one place - from cards and transfers to BLIK and digital wallets.

card4.title: Automate customer service process
card4.description: Streamline onboarding, KYC, settlements and communication, reducing manual team work.

card5.title: Use IT support
card5.description: Get help from experts with integrations, security, and system maintenance.

card6.title: Prevent money laundering (AML)
card6.description: Monitor transactions, detect risks and meet reporting obligations in accordance with AML/CFT.

solution.sectionSubtitle: Tools for companies and supervised financial institutions
solution.sectionDescription: Our integrated platform includes a range of advanced modules that support key operational and regulatory areas. Thus, QonnectOne ensures smooth operation, compliance, efficiency and measurable savings while maximizing revenue potential.

aml.title: AML / KYC Module
aml.description: Automates customer identity verification processes and monitors transactions for suspicious activity. Ensures full compliance with AML/CFT regulations, minimizing legal and operational risk.

transaction.title: Transaction Module
transaction.description: Provides smooth and secure communication with payment service providers and automates their handling in one place. Shortens operation time and increases reliability of payment processes.

crypto.title: Crypto Module
crypto.description: Enables comprehensive integration of digital asset information, including client wallets and transactions in external systems.

reporting.title: Reporting Module
reporting.description: Automates the preparation and submission of reports to regulators (e.g. KNF, NBP, GIIF). Ensures completeness, data validation and status tracking, reducing team burden.

accounting.title: Accounting Module
accounting.description: Enables comprehensive transaction settlements in cooperation with certified operators, facilitates integration with external accounting systems and generates detailed financial reports.

admin.title: Administrative Module
admin.description: Facilitates intuitive management of individual and institutional client databases. Enables efficient registration, segmentation, ticket handling and communication personalization.

backoffice.title: Backoffice Module
backoffice.description: This is the central point of control and management of all aspects of the platform. Provides full operational transparency, transaction monitoring, facilitates user management and all improvements.

api.title: API / Plugin Module
api.description: We offer flexible integration tools that enable quick and seamless connection to any of our Partners' e-commerce platforms using advanced REST API and dedicated plugins.

hero.description: Discover how our solutions help accelerate growth, minimize risk and meet regulatory requirements across different sectors.
hero.benefit2: Minimizing the risk of failures and errors

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: We are QonnectOne, a provider of a technological solution in the SaaS formula, which revolutionizes the market, enabling non-financial companies and payment operators to immediately enrich their offer with embedded banking services.
hero.subtitle: We act as a central hub, integrating client applications with external financial service providers (such as personalized payment cards, settlement accounts or loan services), all through an intuitive API. Our SaaS model guarantees minimization of initial costs and quick implementation, while ensuring full scalability and compliance with regulations (including GDPR, DORA, MICA).

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to transform complexity into a competitive advantage for our clients. We strive to enable every enterprise to "embed" smooth, native and secure financial experiences directly into their products and platforms, thereby increasing customer loyalty and generating new revenue streams. We provide infrastructure (BaaS engine) that allows non-financial companies to engage a larger portion of customers, without having to rely on external banking portals to create a more "seamless, sticky user experience", increasing customer engagement and loyalty.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: That's why we deliver systems that not only guarantee full legal compliance, but also optimize operational processes, reduce risk and open up new development opportunities. Thanks to our experience and deep industry knowledge, we become a reliable partner in building a safe and efficient digital future.

business.title: We understand our Partners' business
business.subtitle: That's why we provide security, scalability and growth
business.p1: By choosing QonnectOne, you gain not only advanced technologies, but above all a partner who actively supports your business in a dynamic regulatory environment. We ensure that your operations will always comply with the highest security and regulatory standards.
business.p2: Thanks to integration with QonnectOne, you don't waste valuable time and resources on building a new system from scratch, expanding existing solutions or a complicated process of obtaining licenses.
business.p3: You also don't have to search for and integrate with many providers, which generates additional costs and complexity. By integrating with us, you receive a complete IT tool and the opportunity to use our Partners' licenses.
business.highlight: What remains on your side is what matters most: business development.

hero.description: We perfectly understand that every business has unique needs and development strategy. That's why we offer our innovative IT systems in flexible models that perfectly adapt to your requirements, infrastructure and budget.

models.sectionSubtitle: Choose the model for your business
models.sectionDescription: Flexible models tailored to your needs and budget

saas.title: SaaS Model
saas.description: Choose convenience and efficiency by using our solutions as a cloud service. Eliminates the need for installation, maintenance and IT infrastructure management. We'll handle security, availability and performance.

license.title: License Model
license.description: If you prefer full control over the software and want to adapt the system to the specific internal processes of your organization, the license model is for you. Acquiring a license gives you the freedom to integrate with existing IT infrastructure.
